name: masum
des: Mr.Sulaiman was very helpful. Answered every question. Sent pictures and videos as requested. Pointed out flaws that didn’t show in pictures so there would be no surprises. Love the car. Love their selection of cars. The entire experience was a pleasure. I will be back the next time I’m in the market. Thanks!
